message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This seems like a fair split to me.
Alice, my turn. I understand your position, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile. This offer considers the time value and ensures we both benefit.
Bob, time is money! This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a hit from inflation with every round.  This is my final offer.
